title: Paneer Makhanwala
description: A rich and creamy delicacy featuring succulent cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) simmered in a luscious tomato and cashew gravy, infused with aromatic spices.

title: Hara Bhara Kabab
description: A flavorful vegetarian delight made with a nutritious blend of spinach, green peas, potatoes, and aromatic spices, crafted into delectable kebabs, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.

title: Gulab Jamun
description: Indulge in the heavenly sweetness of Gulab Jamun, soft and spongy milk solids dipped in a fragrant sugar syrup infused with cardamom and rose water, creating a melt-in-your-mouth dessert experience.
